<h1 align="center">Heyo!! I'm Emi! 👋</h1>

<h3 align="center">Backend Witch, Container Summoner, Frontend Luminary</h3>

<div align="center">
  <img src="https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=ts,tailwind,py,svelte,lua,postgres,docker,linux,bash,nix,git,github" height="60" alt="Skill Icons going left to right: TypeScript, Tailwind, Python, Svelte, Lua, Postgres, Docker, Linux, Bash, Nix, Git, GitHub"  />
</div>


Computer Poker by trade, Software Developer by heart.<br>
<sub><samp>(Official Job Title: **Test Technician**, but that sounds boring 🙄)</samp></sub>

<blockquote>“Through breakdowns to breakthroughs.”</blockquote>
<blockquote>“Don't care if you think it's cringe because it's not your life!”</blockquote>

## What Am I Up To?
- 📺 Making a unit tracking solution for the packing department of the company I work for!
- 🔺 Building a Developer API to keep track of Geometry Dash players and their endeavours!
- 🐭 Learning Go to level up my scaling abilities!

## Side Projects
- ✍️ [skebap](https://github.com/Aproxia-dev/skebap) - An extremely simple Pastebin clone. Built as a graduation project. 🎓
- 🌺 [overgrown](https://github.com/overgrown-hibiscus) - A suite of software configurations made to be flexible and beautiful.
- ❄️ [nixos-config](https://github.com/OwO-digital/nixos-config) - A desktop NixOS configuration made to be shared across several devices with my partner.

<details><summary><b>Fun Facts</b></summary>
    
- I've been fascinated by computers ever since I can remember.
  - As much as I've grown rusty over the years, I am no stranger to multimedia either! 🎥
  - I have fond memories of setting up really cool Minecraft servers when I was barely 11! 🛠️
- I like music a lot, especially experimental music. 🎶
- I used to be pretty good at Beat Saber! ⚔️
- I built and soldered my own keyboard! ⌨️
  - It's a Lily58, an ergonomic split keyboard!
  - Built with Gateron Box Ink Pinks v2s and DSA Astrolokeys! ✨
- My favorite animals are foxes! 🦊
</details>
